original_text: For if that first covenant had been faultless, there would have been no occasion to look for a second.
korean_text: 저 첫 언약이 무흠하였더라면 둘째 것을 요구할 일이 없었으려니와

sentences.original_text: if that first covenant had been faultless
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 그 첫 언약이 흠이 없었다면

sentences.original_text: there would have been no occasion to look for a second
